subtasks: Identify the spill immediately upon occurrence.
Use sand or sawdust from the spill kit to contain the liquid.
Use sand or sawdust to absorb the spilled material.
Act quickly to prevent spreading, contamination, or penetration into surfaces.
Collect the contaminated material using a scoop.
Place the contaminated material into a sealed plastic bag.
Label the sealed plastic bag for proper disposal.
For additional information on pesticide use and personal protective equipment, visit www.cdc.gov.au.
